IndexBuffer indexBuffer_

Detailed Description

This class represents a collection of grouped indices.

The file format for this is a .primitive file.

Member Typedef Documentation

HRESULT Moo::Primitive::drawPrimitiveGroup ( uint32  groupIndex  )  [virtual]

This method draws an individual primitive group, given by index.

Parameters:
groupIndex The index of the group to draw.
Returns:
E_FAIL if indexes have not been set or groupIndex is invalid, or if drawing fails for some other reason.

HRESULT Moo::Primitive::load (  )  [virtual]

This method loads the primitive from a .primitive file.

Returns:
E_FAIL if unsuccessful.
